statement.p: In 32.5 of the last 40 days it rained. How many days did it not rain? days

solution.p: We recall that a percent as a decimal is part/whole. Here that is \displaystyle\frac{{P}}{{40}}={0.325}. We solve for P by multiplying by \displaystyle{40}. \displaystyle{P}={0.325}\cdot{40}={13}. We round that as requested to 13 to find the days it rained. How many days did it NOT rain?
